title: Drawing, "Designs for Citibank Logo", ca. 1975
medium: Graphite and black marker on white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marker, left: CITIBANK/CITIBANK/Citibank/Citibank/CITIBANK/CITIBANK/Citibank/CITIBANK; right: CITI.
description: Vertical list of possible combinations of Citibank logotype and logo. List consists of several logo and font choices including thin sans-serif, slab serif, and combinations of caps and lowercase lettering. Right of the uppermost design is what appears to be a partially completed logotype in thin sans-serif font.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Citibank Logo", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Graphite and black marker on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-25.
